definition: a foolish, stupid, or contemptible person
examples: Something about human nature makes us all think we are the best drivers on the road at any given time. It's everyone else who are the dingleberries.
They shouldn't have to leave jobs they love with people they like—because of some dingleberry with a wandering eye.

definition: a cranberry (Vaccinium erythrocarpum) of the southeastern U.S., its small dark red berry
a piece of dried fecal matter clinging to the hair around the anus
examples: Get over the ick factor and check your pet's rear regularly to make sure no dingleberries are dangling from his fur.
